titleStmt.title: By the King a proclamation inhibiting the resort of His Maiesties people to the court, for cure of the kings euill, and to restraine the accesse of others from infected places.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)

titleStmt.title: By the King a proclamation inhibiting the resort of His Maiesties people to the court, for cure of the kings euill, and to restraine the accesse of others from infected places.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, Printer to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie: And by the Assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: "Giuen at the Court at Greenwich, the twentieth day of Iune, in the eighth yeere of the Reigne of our most gracious Souereigne Lord, King Charles, of England, Scotland, France and Ireland, defender of the Faith, &c."
Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

person.persName: the Kings most Excellent Maiestie: And
